objects.text:
• Puresoft PU Leather
• Height Adjustable
• Padded Armrests
• Supports 275 lbs

product_details.description: Product Description          Amazon Basics Classic Puresoft PU-Padded Mid-Back Office Computer Desk Chair with Armrest - Cream             From the Manufacturer          Amazon Basics VERSATILE USE: Office desk chair for home office, work station, or conference room ADJUSTABLE COMFORT: Adjustable seat height, adjustable seat angle, and tilt control for customizable comfort STURDY CONSTRUCTION:Supports up to 275 pounds; sturdy KD metal base COMFORTABLE DESIGN:Puresoft PU upholstery in Black; contoured padded seat, backrest, and armrests for comfort; durable caster wheels for smooth-rolling mobility EASY ASSEMBLY:Assembly instructions included; components (casters, base, arms, seat mechanism, hardware kit) arrive packed in the back cushion PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS: Product Dimensions: 23.75 x 26 x 38.25 - 42 inches (WxDxH); seat width: 19.5 inches; seat depth: 17.75 inches; arm height: 26.25 - 30 inches Brand - Amazon Basics ** Color - Cream ** Product Dimensions - 26"D x 23.75"W x 42"H ** Size - 26"D x 23.75"W x 42"H ** Back Style - Mid Back **

banner_details:
This banner is a promotional visual designed to highlight an ergonomic office chair. It is split vertically into two contrasting halves: the left side features a light grey and white background with a circular pattern, and the right side uses darker tones of grey with overlapping grid lines. A high-resolution cut-out image of the chair takes center-right position. The top-left corner presents a bold multi-line heading ("heading") in uppercase, suggesting brand and product type. Below it, a slimmer subheading ("subheading") emphasizes comfort. The bottom-left offers a bullet-point list of features ("description"), while the lower-right highlights the price ("price") and a call-to-action button ("cta") nested on a rounded rectangle ("cta_background").

**Color Palette**:
- Light Grey: #F5F5F5
- Mid Grey: #EAEAEA
- Dark Grey: #333333
- Accent Grey: #4D4D4D
- Button Fill: #FFFFFF
- Text Dark: #333333
- Text Muted: #555555
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek office chair featuring a harmonious blend of cream and black. The main upholstery is a soft, elegant cream tone (#F2F1EB), giving the chair a clean and sophisticated appearance. The armrests, base, and support parts are a flat matte black (#1F1F1F), creating a striking contrast that helps accentuate the creamy leather. A touch of metallic dark gray (#3A3A3A) is subtly used in the adjustment components, blending function with modern style. For an advertisement banner, a palette of Warm Cream (#F2F1EB), Jet Black (#1F1F1F), Ash Gray (#3A3A3A), and a soft neutral background (#E8E6E1) will highlight the product's elegance and comfort.
